reuze

Class gb_Axis

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.gb_Axis

  • public class gb_Axis
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable origin + axis in 3D-Space.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      gb_Vector3 dir 
      gb_Vector3 origin 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      gb_Axis()
      Creates a new z-Axis3D object from the world origin.
      gb_Axis(float x, float y, float z) 
      gb_Axis(gb_Ray ray) 
      gb_Axis(gb_Vector3 dir)
      Creates a new Axis3D from the world origin in the given direction.
      gb_Axis(gb_Vector3 o, gb_Vector3 dir)
      Creates a new Axis3D from the given origin and direction.
